actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973.

summary.text: Revises the Regional Rail Reorganization Act to require that any line of railroad on which rail service was being provided as of the effective date of the Act and which was recommended in the preliminary system plan for transfer to the United States Railway Association shall be deemed to be designated in the final system plan for transfer to the Association.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973.
